title: Line Leader
duties: Lead the class down the hall calmly and responsibly.
Watch and listen for the teacherâ€™s directions and stop the line whenever directed.

title: Paper Passer
duties: Pass out and collect papers in an orderly fashion when the teacher asks for help.

title: Tech Support
duties: Help other students with logging in, accessing websites for class activities, and submitting online assignments.
Help the teacher troubleshoot tech issues when they ask for help.

title: Botanist
duties: Waters the classroom plants on schedule.
Cleans up dead leaves and spilled dirt around the plants.
